column4: hi, I have an eee 1005ha and the volume is terribly low after setting everything up to 100%
hi, I have an eee 1005ha and the volume is terribly low after setting everything up to 100%
can someone tell me how to fix this ?
did you check levels in alsamixer?
yes, like I said, everything up to 100%
are you sure htere just not quite speakers?
it'svery low on headphones
did you check the PCM level in the volume options?
yes, like I said, everything up to 100%
click preferences and see if you can checkbox PCM2 and make sure that is all the way up.
also if your laptop has a volume control dial on it make sure that is all the way up as well.
what type of sound card do you ahve btw?
intel built in the eee
i'm searching the forums hol dup
thanks, been trying to find something useful for weeks
most people are suggesting to switch to oss which can produce higher sound output.
I would check this out
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1135526
ok, thanks !
in that post there are two solutions
ok, I'll give them a shot, thanks
